name: Evoslime
description:
Summary:

This is a prototype adventure game where you play as a slime and explore the surroundings, finding different types of food to eat. Once you've consumed a certain amount of food, you will be able to evolve into a different type of slime. The slime that you will evolve as differs according to what you eat. Currently, there is only 2 possible evolutions from the blue slime and no secondary evolutions.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys: Move

Space: Attack

Escape: Pause

E: Evolve (when available)
